Title: How to Avoid Boring Brainstorm Meetings with Danny Warshay
Description:
Join us as our host, George Kamel, talks to Danny Warshay. Danny is an entrepreneur who has co-founded and sold multiple companies and teaches entrepreneurship at Brown University. Danny shares how to keep brainstorm meetings from becoming boring and unproductive so your team can solve problems. Later in the episode, George chats with Chris Dean, the executive director of content marketing here at Ramsey Solutions. Chris walks you through how to validate ideas before you launch them into the world.

 

You’ll learn:

  • How to make sure your brainstorm meetings don’t suck
  • How to get the best ideas out of your team
  • How to easily test your ideas
  • How Dave Ramsey’s team tests ideas
